headline: Dominion Energy (NYSE:D) Confirms 2025 Earnings Guidance and Reports Q1 Financial Growth
summary: Dominion Energy (NYSE:D) recently announced its first-quarter earnings for 2025, reporting an increase in sales and net income. The company affirmed its operating earnings guidance, maintaining a positive outlook. Over the past week, Dominion's share price experienced a 1.97% increase, a move that parallels the broader market's upward trend. While the company's solid earnings and positive guidance might have provided additional support, the market's overall positive momentum, buoyed by strong...

headline: Dominion beats quarterly estimates on Virginia, South Carolina power demand
summary: (Reuters) -U.S. utility Dominion Energy reported first-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations on Thursday, helped by lower interest costs and strong demand from Virginia and South Carolina.  Power demand in the U.S. is expected to hit record highs in 2025 and 2026 due to rising demand from AI data centers, cryptocurrency technologies as well as homes and businesses, according to the U.S. Energy Information Administration.

headline: Dominion Energy (D) Beats Q1 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Dominion Energy (D) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 20.78% and 6.76%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Dominion Energy: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Richmond, Virginia-based company said it had profit of 75 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and to account for discontinued operations, were 93 cents per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Dominion Energy: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Richmond, Virginia-based company said it had profit of 75 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and to account for discontinued operations, were 93 cents per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

headline: Dominion Energy Announces First-Quarter 2025 Earnings Results
summary: RICHMOND, Va., May 01, 2025--Dominion Energy, Inc. (NYSE: D), today announced unaudited net income determined in accordance with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP or reported earnings) for the three months ended March 31, 2025, of $646 million ($0.75 per share) compared with net income of $441 million ($0.50 per share) for the same period in 2024.

raw.headline: Dominion Energy Announces First-Quarter 2025 Earnings Results

headline: Is Dominion Energy the Smartest Investment You Can Make Today?
summary: Dominion Energy is an electric utility with an above-average 5% dividend yield.  Dominion Energy has a monopoly in one of the largest data center markets on the planet.  Dominion Energy (NYSE: D) has a number of very attractive features to offer dividend investors.
